title: Jinsei
alternative_title: 人生相談テレビアニメーション「人生」
description: The story centers around Akamatsu Yuuki, a boy who joins the staff of his school's second newspaper. The editor-in-chief Nikaidou Ayaka immediately assigns him to the life (Jinsei) advice column. Three girls — the science representative Endou Rino, the liberal arts representative Kujou Fumi, and the physical education representative Suzuki Ikumi — answer requests from students about whatever is troubling them.
